definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Could I change to a sleeper, please?
I planned to take the sleeper train there.
sentences.chinese: 我計劃在那兒搭乘臥車。

sentences.english: I usually go up to London on the sleeper.
sentences.chinese: 我一般都乘臥車去倫敦。

sentences.english: This family never booked the first-class compartment of the train.
sentences.chinese: 這個家庭從不預訂一等的火車臥車包房。

sentences.english: Hardly had the train arrived at the station when we ran towards the sleeping car looking for our guests.
sentences.chinese: 火車剛一進站，我們就跑到臥車那兒去找我們的客人。

sentences.english: There are dining cars and sleeping cars in both trains.
sentences.chinese: 這兩趟車都有餐車和臥車。

sentences.english: The sleeping car was coupled on at Nankou Station.
sentences.chinese: 在南口車站掛上了臥車。
